title: Shohei Snubbed?
description:
Pablo Torre and Tony Kornheiser discuss if Jimmy Garoppolo’s new contract with the 49ers is good for both sides, who has a stronger case for MVP; Aaron Judge or Shohei Ohtani and if Serena can make a run in the US Open following her first round win. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: Jimmy G reaches a one year deal with the 49ers and who has a stronger case for MVP: Judge or Ohtani?
